message: I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $180. It's a fantastic deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

I can see you're a serious buyer, and I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I need to make a profit, so I can offer you a compromise at $160. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $145? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not willing to go above that.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $155. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. Would you be willing to go down to $150? I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget.

I can see you're really close to making a decision, Bob! However, I need to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I can offer it to you for $155 again, but this time I'll throw in a small bonus - I'll include a free accessory that's worth $10. That way, you'll get a great deal, and I'll still make a profit. What do you think?
I appreciate the bonus offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. Would you be willing to go down to $152? I'm really close to walking away, but I still want to make this deal work.

I can see you're really serious about getting this deal done, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $154, but I need to make a profit. I'll throw in the same bonus I offered earlier - the free accessory worth $10. That way, you'll get a great deal, and I'll still make a fair profit. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I've decided to take a chance and walk away from the deal. I'll consider buying the product from John for $120 instead.
